description: Comprehensive HFT Performance Dashboard for Bender Server - Latency, System Resources, Network Health

panels.description: Primary latency KPI. Lower is better.
panels.title: P99 Reaction Time

panels.description: Worst-case latency spike. Critical for risk management.
panels.title: P100 Max Spike

panels.description: Latency variance. Lower means more stable system. Target <20us
panels.title: Jitter (P99-P50)

panels.description: Thread pool contention. 0=normal, >1=CPU starvation
panels.title: Thread Pool Congestion

panels.description: Time sync offset. Critical for HFT. Target <1ms
panels.title: Chrony Offset

panels.description: UDP receive/send errors indicating network problems
panels.title: UDP Errors Rate

panels.description: Total platform reaction latency breakdown by Bender server instance
panels.title: Platform Reaction Time by BS

panels.description: Market data processing to after-cycle completion delay
panels.title: MD to AfterCycle Delay by BS

panels.description: Gateway wake to send, and post-order to gateway wake delays
panels.title: Gateway Path Delays
ROBOT TIMING ANALYSIS - PER ROBOT BREAKDOWN

panels.description: Full cycle time per robot. Identifies slow robots.
panels.title: Robot Cycle Time P99 by Robot

panels.description: Reaction time per robot to market data
panels.title: Robot Reaction Time by Robot

panels.description: Time from gateway receive to publisher output
panels.title: Gateway to Publisher Delay

panels.description: Delay from publish start to all subscribers notified
panels.title: Publisher to Subscribers Delay

panels.description: Book delay from publisher to individual robots
panels.title: Publisher to Robot Delay

panels.description: Time from after-cycle decision to order sent
panels.title: AfterCycle to Sent Delay

panels.description: Full roundtrip time to exchange and back
panels.title: Exchange Roundtrip

panels.description: Time from receiving own deal to strategy notification
panels.title: Own Deal Delay

panels.description: Bender server internal queue metrics. Spikes indicate backpressure.
panels.title: BS Queue Size and Duration

panels.description: TCP queue size and throughput
panels.title: TCP Queue Metrics

panels.description: Time robots wait for thread pool. High values = CPU contention.
panels.title: Thread Pool Robot Wait

panels.description: UDP receive errors, buffer errors. Non-zero indicates network/buffer issues.
panels.title: UDP Errors by Type

panels.description: TCP retransmission rate indicating packet loss
panels.title: TCP Retransmits

panels.description: Network interface drops indicating overload
panels.title: Network Drops
SYSTEM RESOURCES - CPU AND MEMORY BY PROCESS

panels.description: CPU time per process. Identify CPU-hungry processes.
panels.title: CPU Usage by Process (Top 10)

panels.description: Involuntary context switches per process. Spikes indicate scheduling issues.
panels.title: Context Switches by Process (Top 10)

panels.description: Resident memory per process
panels.title: Memory RSS by Process (Top 10)

panels.description: System load 1/5/15 minute averages
panels.title: System Load Average

panels.description: Time offset from reference. Critical for HFT - should be <100us
panels.title: Chrony Reference Offset

panels.description: Estimated error bound of time source
panels.title: Chrony Reference Deviation

panels.description: Difference between system time and reference
panels.title: System Time vs Reference

panels.description: BS started state. 1=running, 0=stopped
panels.title: Bender Server State

panels.description: Gateway started state and subscriber count
panels.title: Gateway State

panels.description: Robot trading capability. 1=can trade, 0=restricted
panels.title: Robot Can Trade Flag

panels.description: Market data source weights for failover monitoring
panels.title: MD Source Weight

title: Bender HFT Performance Dashboard
